title: Energy & immune system
cleaned_text: Feeling rundown? Help support your body's stamina and endurance, by learning more about how it works and ways to boost your energy levels. Different types of ginseng are found across the world, and have been used as a natural healthcare products for 2000 years. Ginseng is a delicate plant, so it's handled with care all the way from seed to the mature plant. Lifestyle insight Immune boosting foods and habits can help you avoid those so-called bugs that always seem to be going around. Lifestyle insight Getting sick all the time doesn't have to be a way of life. There are lots of things you can do to give your immune system a natural boost. Lifestyle insight A common source of stress in our lives often relates back to our work. Lifestyle insight Are you focused on hard work habits or smart work solutions? The difference can have a big impact on your health, happiness and productivity. Lifestyle insight Several clinical studies have shown that the immune system is enhanced after taking Ginsana®.1-5 But how does this happen? Quality research matters. Learn about the evidence and what to look for when choosing a reliable natural medicine.
